title: Frodo, Son of Drogo (1C290)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire

Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3

Resistance:	10
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Fellowship: Exert another companion who has the Frodo signet to heal Frodo.
Lore:	”'I think you'll find there's more to this Hobbit than meets the eye.'”
Rarity:	C
